IncidentDef.label: vulture flock
IncidentDef.letterText: Drawn by multiple broken mechanoids in the area, a squad of vultures are approaching to salvage their machinery. They aren’t intent on fighting and will leave once the resources are retrieved or if they can’t retrieve their objective peacefully within a day.

IncidentDef.label: wandering mechanoids
IncidentDef.letterText: Fleeing from a conflict, a group of mechanoids are passing through the area in search of repairs. They will try to avoid further endangering themselves and will only attack in self defence.
